messages.title: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats: Run many of our biggest cities including Liverpool, Sheffield and Bristol. Won more votes than Labour in the last elections. Are stronger now than at any time since 1929. Can deliver real change across Britain today.

messages.title: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
messages.content: Nick Clegg's tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduces a tax plan to ensure no tax on the first £10,000 earned and a reduction of most tax bills by £700.

issues.economy: Nick Clegg's tax plan suggests a focus on improving the economy by adjusting tax policies.
issues.governance: The mention of the Liberal Democrats running major cities and being stronger than any time since 1929 touches on governance.

endorsements.endorsement: Supports Joseph Lee and indicates that the Liberal Democrats can deliver real change.

images.caption: Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are winning support across Britain.
